Class SAMLTokenUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.spacebel.webservice.authentication.SAMLTokenUtils

  • public class SAMLTokenUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    The SAMLTokenUtils class provides a method to build a SAML token.
    Author:
    Pierre Denis (pds), Minh Nguyen Quang

    • Method Detail

      • buildSAMLToken

        public org.w3c.dom.Element buildSAMLToken(javax.naming.directory.Attributes attributes)
                                   throws org.opensaml.SAMLException,
                                          javax.naming.NamingException
        Builds and returns a SAML assertion based on the attributes of the given user data.
        Parameters:
        userData - data of the user to be put in the token
        Returns:
        a DOM element with the SAML assertion
        Throws:
        org.opensaml.SAMLException - if probleme occurs in the generation of the SAML assertion
        javax.naming.NamingException - if problem occurs to retrieve attributes from given user data

      • getSAMLAttributes

        public javax.naming.directory.Attributes getSAMLAttributes(javax.naming.directory.Attributes ldapAttributes)
        to return a set of user attributes to be included in the SAML token. Note: the corresponding LDAP attributes' names could be different to the SAML attributes'names. The mapping is done via a configuration file.
        Returns:
